song.title: Here's to it
song.chorus: Here's to a long life and a merry one Here's to a quick death and an easy one Here's to a pretty girl and an honest one Here's to a cold pint and another one
song.verse: May you always have walls for the wind A roof for the rain and tea beside the fire Laughter to cheer you and those you love near you And all your heart may desire
May the sun shine all day long Everything go right and nothing go wrong May those who you love bring love back to you And may all your wishes come true
May be your pockets be heavy and your heart be light May good luck follow you morning and night May pretty girls follow you to your door May you never want for more
May you have love that never ends Lots of money, and lots of friends Health be yours whatever you do Lift the cup as we drink to you
Here's to a woman's kisses And to irish whiskey, amber and beer Not as sweet as the kiss of the miss But a damn side?? more sincere
Now I have known quite a many And liked more than a few But I have loved only one my dear And this toast is to you
